ygData.subject: Re: Selo's Accelerando and Root
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It also seemed to me that root was nerfed yet again in the same patch, so it s possible they also slipped up and nerfed it on npc s as well as pc s and
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, Sep 28/99, John.Curry@... wrote:
> From: John.Curry@...
>
> I trust this list. It had never occured to me that the Root-Nerf wasnt
> true. But in the last 3(or so) weeks. I have been rooted over a half a
> dozen times and have never been UNable to Selo my way out. Or so it seems.

It also seemed to me that root was nerfed yet again in the same patch,
so it's possible they also slipped up and nerfed it on npc's as well as
pc's and that's why you're seeing it drop so quickly.

--
